text: "Yesterday's Wine" is a 1971 song by Willie Nelson and is the title track to his 13th studio album of the same name. It went to number 62 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart and later went to number 1 in 1982 as a duet by Merle Haggard and George Jones. It was used on the duet album by Haggard and Jones. ==References== Category:1971 songs Category:Country songs Category:Willie Nelson songs Category:Merle Haggard songs Category:George Jones songs
title: Yesterday's Wine (song)
